title.text: Country, Regional and World GDP (Gross Domestic Product)
Country, Regional and World GDP (Gross Domestic Product)

description.text: Country, regional and world GDP in current US Dollars ($). Regional means collections of countries e.g. Europe & Central Asia. Data is sourced from the World Bank and turned into a standard normalized CSV.
